g.text: 2.1.0. DFSP2 sends a PUT call on /error end-point for a Transfer request
DFSP2 sends a Fulfil Success Transfer request
the quoting process or regenerate it using
Validate incoming token and originator matching Payee
Route & Publish Abort/Reject event for Payee
Ensure event is replicated as configured (ACKS=all)
Respond replication acknowledgements have been received
